name: Tokyo Urban Explorer
description: Experience the vibrant energy of Tokyo with this guided tour covering Shibuya, Shinjuku and historic Asakusa. Immerse yourself in modern culture while sampling world‑class cuisine and uncovering centuries of tradition.

name: Bali Beach Retreat
description: Soak up the sun and relax on Bali's pristine beaches. This retreat combines yoga sessions, cultural excursions to Ubud and Uluwatu and plenty of free time to unwind by the ocean.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival and beach welcome dinner
Day 2: Morning yoga and Ubud rice terraces
Day 3: Water sports in Nusa Dua
Day 4: Cultural tour of Uluwatu Temple
Day 6: Spa day and cooking class

name: Paris Culinary Journey
description: For the food lover in you, this gastronomic adventure explores the city's legendary cafés, patisseries and bistros. Learn to bake croissants, sample fine wines and discover hidden food markets.
itinerary: Day 2: Baking class and pastry tour
Day 5: Free day to explore Paris

name: Himalayan Adventure Trek
description: Challenge yourself with a breathtaking trek through the Himalayas. This adventure takes you past glacial lakes, alpine meadows and remote mountain villages with expert guides.
